Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Chocobox = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local chocoGui local chocoFrame local chocoButton
local fire
local floatForce local bv
Tool.Enabled = true
local inCooldown = false
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function lunge(humanoid, torso) local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HoldAnim) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) bv = nil swordOut() if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.P = 100000 bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(bv.P, 0, bv.P) bv.velocity = direction * 50 bv.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if bv ~= nil then bv:remove() end wait(.5) swordUp() end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or vCharacter == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil and fire and fire.Parent then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(11) end end
function onEquipped(mouse)
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = firePart fire.Color = Color3.new(165/255, 0, 33/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) fire.Heat = 25 fire.Size = 6
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then local playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui then chocoGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") chocoGui.Name = "ChocoGui" chocoGui.Parent = playerGui
chocoFrame = Instance.new("Frame") chocoFrame.Name = "ChocoFrame" chocoFrame.Parent = chocoGui chocoFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 chocoFrame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 300, 0, 300) chocoFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 10, 0.5, 0)
chocoButton = Instance.new("ImageButton") chocoButton.Name = "ChocoButton" chocoButton.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 chocoButton.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=72075838" chocoButton.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) chocoButton.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) chocoButton.Parent = chocoFrame
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = chocoGui frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 260, 0, 30) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -130, 1, -130) frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound
local helpText = Instance.new("TextLabel") helpText.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 helpText.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) helpText.Visible = true helpText.ZIndex = 10 helpText.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size10 helpText.Font = Enum.Font.Legacy helpText.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 127/255, 0) helpText.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center helpText.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top helpText.Parent = frame helpText.Text = "Click on the chocobox to see your luck!"
chocoButton.MouseButton1Click:connect(function() if Chocobox.Transparency == 0.0 and myHumanoid and myTorso then Chocobox.Transparency = 1.0 local effect = math.random() if effect < 0.4 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 29.0 helpText.Text = "You are faster!" wait(5.0) helpText.Text = "Click on the chocobox to see your luck!" myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 elseif effect >= 0.4 and effect < 0.75 then
local ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth while myHumanoid.MaxHealth < 250 do myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 250 end
while myHumanoid.Health < ratio * myHumanoid.MaxHealth do myHumanoid.Health = ratio * myHumanoid.MaxHealth end helpText.Text = "You are stronger!" wait(5.0) helpText.Text = "Click on the chocobox to see your luck!" local ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100
elseif effect >= 0.75 and effect < 0.8 then floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.Name = "Float" floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 3 * myTorso:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = myTorso helpText.Text = "You can glide!" wait(5.0) helpText.Text = "Click on the chocobox to see your luck!" if floatForce then floatForce:Destroy() end else fire.Parent = myTorso myTorso.Touched:connect(blow) lunge(myHumanoid, myTorso) helpText.Text = "You are Buuuuuuuuuuuuurning!" wait(6.0) helpText.Text = "Click on the chocobox to see your luck!" if fire then fire:Destroy() end end wait(2.0) Chocobox.Transparency = 0.0 end end) end end end
function onUnequipped() Chocobox.Transparency = 0.0 if chocoGui then chocoGui:Destroy() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 local ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100.0 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100.0 if fire then fire:Destroy() end if floatForce then floatForce:Remove() end if bv then bv:Destroy() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
